Name: Chickenpox
Information: A highly contagious viral infection causing itchy, blister-like rashes.

Name: Cowpox
Information: A rare viral skin infection transmitted from cattle, resulting in pustular lesions.

Name: HFMD
Information: Hand, foot, and mouth disease; a common viral illness affecting children, causing sores and rashes.

Name: Healthy
Information: Normal skin without visible dermatological abnormalities.

Name: Measles
Information: A viral infection marked by a red, blotchy skin rash and flu-like symptoms.

Name: Monkeypox
Information: A viral zoonotic disease with symptoms similar to smallpox, including rashes and pustules.
